author: Luke Kenny
comment: Until an update screwed the alignment up on Moto 360. Three months later and still not fixed. Poor show.
title: One of the slickest watch faces

author: Darren Steven
comment: Has potential, Unfortunately on Moto 360 Gen 1, it seems to align with the bottom of the screen, not the top, which leaves a gap the same size as the amient light sensor at the top of the face. Not usable, but fixable guys...

author: John Montgomery
comment: This is probably the best looking analog face I've found for my G Watch. Only request I have for it is a day/date display. Otherwise it's almost perfect.
title: Beautiful

author: Gary Carter
comment: It's dropped off centre on Moto 360, is it so hard to fix?!
title: Fix it!

author: Sirr Diarra
comment: This watch face looks like a triangle in my moto 360. Please refund my money. Four days just pass, and I still didn't get a refund. I want my money back now please.
title: Not round

author: Steve Keen
comment: I really like this watch face - the 3D effect with the highlight and shadows looks terrific.
title: Love it

author: Ian Irvine
comment: Used to work great, now is not centred on the screen and is useless. Do not buy this, it's broken. Moto 360
title: Alignment off

author: Morris Lee
comment: Need customizations, but exactly what I was looking for to simulate a real analog watch
title: Great concept

author: Tim Box
comment: Always takes a second on wake up to update the time.  Other faces do not suffer like this.
title: Not bad but lags on updating time

author: Henry McDonald
comment: Lack of depth on physical watch features leaves me wanting more on other watch faces.  Would love to see some customization options for setting the depth of components here. In any case, love the idea and hope it catches on!
title: Cool Effect!

author: Dana Murray
comment: The 3D effect is subtle, but looks nice. Active display mode is very visible, which is a plus. I do agree with another review in that I'd like to see an update that includes the option to have the date displayed.

reply.author: Orbit Watches
reply.content:
Hi David, sometimes it can take awhile for a face to show up on your watch. If it still doesn't show up, uninstalling and reinstalling always fixes it for me.

Edit : Glad you where able to get it working, thanks for the feedback!

title: Looks great!

author: Robert Zablocki
comment: Installed earlier today, twice already it has frozen the watch into an eventual reboot.

reply.author: Orbit Watches
reply.content: Hi Rob, Thank you for the feedback. We just fixed this bug in the latest update.

title: Buggy

author: Derek Tishler
comment: My favorite part is the passive mode appearance, its great for reading analog time without unlocking the watch.
title: Perfect 3D watch for Wear.

author: Scott Tobin
comment: It would look a bit nicer if it had the date on it. I really like it though.
title: I like it

author: Henry F. Ruiz
comment: Nice watch face but like the reviews say the face is off aliment. A simple shift up would fix the problem
title: Aliment issue

author: Jeff Graber
comment: This is a terrific daily use, easy to read face. I installed it and never looked back.
title: Usability is King
